```{r}
countries <- merge(countries, precipitation_data, by.x = "ISO_A3", by.y = "code")

color_pal <- colorQuantile("YlOrRd", precipitation_data[[column_name]], n = 5)

map <- leaflet(countries) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$OpenStreetMap) %>%
  addPolygons(fillColor = ~color_pal(eval(parse(text = column_name))),
              fillOpacity = 0.8, 
              color = "white", 
              weight = 0.5,
              popup = ~paste(NAME, ":", eval(parse(text = column_name)), "mm"))

# Hiển thị bản đồ
print(map)
```

```{r}
library(stringr)

df_precipitation_filtered <- df_precipitation[str_detect(df_precipitation$code, '^[A-Za-z]+$'), ]
df_precipitation_filtered <- df_precipitation_filtered[, c('code', '1901-07')]
df_precipitation_filtered <- na.omit(df_precipitation_filtered)
names(df_precipitation_filtered)[names(df_precipitation_filtered) == '1901-07'] <- 'value'
```

```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(sf)
library(readxl)

countries <- st_read("path_to_your_geojson_file.geojson")

precipitation_data <- read_excel("path_to_your_excel_file.xlsx")

column_name <- "2020-07"

countries <- merge(countries, precipitation_data, by.x = "ISO_A3", by.y = "code")

color_pal <- colorQuantile("YlOrRd", precipitation_data[[column_name]], n = 5)

map <- leaflet(countries) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$OpenStreetMap) %>%
  addPolygons(fillColor = ~color_pal(eval(parse(text = column_name))),
              fillOpacity = 0.8, 
              color = "white", 
              weight = 0.5,
              popup = ~paste(NAME, ":", eval(parse(text = column_name)), "mm"))

# Hiển thị bản đồ
print(map)

```

```{r}
library(globe4r)
world <- create_globe(height = "100vh") %>%
  globe_choropleth(
    coords(
      country = code,
      altitude = value,
      cap_color = value
    ), 
    data = df_precipitation_filtered
  ) %>% 
  scale_choropleth_cap_color() %>%  
  scale_choropleth_altitude(0.06, 0.1) %>%
  show_atmosphere(show = TRUE) %>%
  show_graticules(show = TRUE)

world
```
